site.description:
TagSEA is a robust, extendable framework with exemplary tools used for tagging and waypointing source code, resources, or whatever you would like within Eclipse.
Note: you MUST uninstall all previous versions of TagSEA older than 0.5.0 in order to use this update site. Keeping older versions of tagsea installed will cause conflicts.

category-def.name: TagSEA Core and Help
category-def.label: TagSEA
category-def.description: The basic elements of TagSEA. Includes the TagSEA platform, documentation, java waypoints, and resource waypoints.
